title: Handwritten/Script type font
content:
Can someone help me ID the font used for the words well and soul?  
Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125647im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font%20ID_5619.jpg)

Font: 

 Voluptate 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125647/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: drmurphy

comments.content:
The lowercase is **[Voluptate](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125647/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.myfonts.com/fonts/fontscafe/voluptate/)** by Fontscafe [2012]  
I can't find this kind of /W & /S in normal or alternate letters, so I suppose they are modified...
